title.rendered: Boys+Girls join global collective by The Network

content.rendered:
Boys + Girls has joined the global creative network as the exclusive partner representing Ireland. by The Network was founded by the creative leader Per Pedersen – who has over 500 major awards to his name, including the most recent multi Grand Prix winning ‘Swedish Number’. 

Pederson spent over 25 years working in the Grey Group, most recently as Global Creative Chairman of Grey Worldwide. Speaking about the network, Per says “We are a global dream-team of highly awarded independent agencies and free-spirited creatives, a network owned by creatives. Boys + Girls is the perfect partner for our new type of independently owned creative network. Their pedigree of global, award winning creative and effective work will elevate our creative capabilities and our global footprint. This is evident in their most recent win of a Yellow and Graphite Pencil at D&AD for their radio work”. 

by The Network offers a new breed of curated creative and strategic talent, built for excellence, speed and agility without the typical layers and complexities that come with global networks and holding companies. Boys + Girls become the network’s 25th member agency across 27 markets. Each agency remains fully independent while co-owning the network. The network plans to expand but will cap its membership at 30 agencies to ensure it remains nimble and hard-working. 

Although only in existence since October last year, the success of the network is already evident with them being selected to lead global work for Snap, Netflix and Carlsberg amongst many other clients. We’re delighted to join such an exciting and creative group of agencies and can’t wait to put the power and skills of the Network to work for our clients. 

The network offers direct access to 500+ highly awarded creatives around the globe. The agencies include: Marvin, Los Angeles, Small, New York, Ostrich Co., Toronto, Founders, Miami, Mexico City, Kingston Jamaica and Buenos Aires, Libre, Panama City, Rehab, London, Freeturn, London, Los Angeles, Herezie, Paris, Milan, Amsterdam Berlin, Amsterdam, Berlin, Worth Your While, Copenhagen, Farm, Stockholm, _2045, Barcelona, White Rabbit, Budapest, Mr+Positive, Tokyo, Seoul, Setters, Moscow, Skt. Petersburg, Girls Are Awesome, Copenhagen. The Sway Effect, New York, Untangld, Melbourne, Blak Labs/E The Agency, Singapore, Thank You Studio, Copenhagen, Allyens, Antwerp, Atlantic, New York, Sao Paulo, Atom, Mumbai, New Delhi, Bangalore, Mortierbrigade, Brussels, Liberate, Copenhagen and Boys + Girls, Dublin.
